projects.title: Parking Reservation System
projects.description: ParkMate is a full-stack parking reservation web application that allows users to search and book parking spots in real time, while admins can manage venues, slots, and bookings. Built with a Next.js frontend and a Node.js/Express backend, it features JWT-based authentication, role-based access control, Stripe payment integration, and a scalable MongoDB database.

projects.title: News Aggregation Platform
projects.description: NewsMania is a full-stack MERN news aggregation platform that delivers real-time articles from multiple sources. Users can browse news by category, bookmark articles, and search content, while the system supports AI-powered summarization and multilingual translation for an enhanced reading experience.

projects.title: Text-to-Speech Converter
projects.description: Text-to-Speech Converter is a lightweight web application that converts written text into natural-sounding speech across multiple languages.

projects.title: Weather Application
projects.description: Weather App is a responsive web application that provides real-time weather information based on user-searched locations. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it integrates a third-party weather API to display current conditions, temperature, and weather forecasts through a clean and intuitive interface.

about.main: I’m Ayush Rai, a passionate full-stack web developer based in India with a strong interest in building scalable and user-focused web applications.
about.journey: Currently pursuing a B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering, I have hands-on experience working with modern web technologies through personal projects, hackathons, and competitive programming.
about.passion: I enjoy solving real-world problems through clean code and thoughtful system design. My recent work focuses on full-stack applications, authentication systems, payments, and performance optimization.
about.connect: Explore my portfolio and let’s connect for collaborations!
